mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.company_id AS "companyId", a.company_name AS "companyName", a.mode_cooperate AS "modeCooperate", a.rent_time AS "rentTime", a.rent_long AS "rentLong", a.node_data AS "nodeData", a.ernt_unit AS "erntUnit", a.quasi_unit AS "quasiUnit", a.gate_data AS "gateData", a.pay_time AS "payTime", a.amount AS "amount", a.deposit AS "deposit", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_bv_node_allocate( id, company_id, company_name, mode_cooperate, rent_time, rent_long, node_data, ernt_unit, quasi_unit, gate_data, pay_time, amount, deposit, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{companyId}, #{companyName}, #{modeCooperate}, #{rentTime}, #{rentLong}, #{nodeData}, #{erntUnit}, #{quasiUnit}, #{gateData}, #{payTime}, #{amount}, #{deposit}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_bv_node_allocate SET company_id =#{companyId}, company_name = #{companyName}, mode_cooperate = #{modeCooperate}, rent_time = #{rentTime}, rent_long = #{rentLong}, node_data = #{nodeData}, ernt_unit = #{erntUnit}, quasi_unit = #{quasiUnit}, gate_data = #{gateData}, pay_time = #{payTime}, amount = #{amount}, deposit = #{deposit}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
